00009 /**
00010  * the default html-helper, available in each view.
00011  * modify this helper, or build your own one.
00012  * @package kata_helper
00013  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00014  */
00015 class HtmlHelper extends Helper {
00016 
00017     /**
00018      * build a href link
00019      * 
00020      * @param string $title what the link should say
00021      * @param string url where the link should point (is automatically expanded if relative link)
00022      * @param array $htmlAttributes array of attributes of the link, for example "class"=>"dontunderline"
00023      * @param string an optional message that asks if you are really shure if you click on the link and aborts navigation if user clicks cancel, ignored if false
00024      * @param boolean $escapeTitle if we should run htmlspecialchars over the links title
00025      */
00026     function link($title, $url, $htmlAttributes = array (), $confirmMessage = false, $escapeTitle = true) {
00027         if ($escapeTitle) {
00028             $title = htmlspecialchars($title, ENT_QUOTES);
00029         }
00030 
00031         if ($confirmMessage) {
00032             $confirmMessage = $this->escape($confirmMessage, true);
00033             $htmlAttributes['onclick'] = 'return confirm(\'' . $confirmMessage . '\');';
00034         }
00035 
00036         if (((strpos($url, '://')) || (strpos($url, 'javascript:') === 0) || (strpos($url, 'mailto:') === 0) || substr($url, 0, 1) == '#')) {
00037             return sprintf($this->tags['link'], $url, $this->parseAttributes($htmlAttributes), $title);
00038         } else {
00039             return sprintf($this->tags['link'], $this->url($url, true), $this->parseAttributes($htmlAttributes), $title);
00040         }
00041     }
00042 
00043     /**
00044      * builds a complete link to an image. if relative it is assumed the image can be found in "webroot/"
00045      * 
00046      * @param string $url filename of the image (is automatically expanded if relative link)
00047      * @param array $htmlAttributes array of attributes of the link, for example "class"=>"dontunderline"
00048      */
00049     function image($url, $htmlAttributes = array ()) {
00050         return sprintf($this->tags['image'], $this->url($url), $this->parseAttributes($htmlAttributes));
00051     }
00052 
00053     /**
00054      * build select/option tags
00055      * 
00056      * <samp>
00057      * $arr = array('blue'=>'Blue color','red'=>'Red color');
00058      * echo $html->selectTag('gameinput',$arr,'red');
00059      * </samp>
00060      * 
00061      * @param string $fieldName name-part of the select-tag
00062      * @param array $optionElements array with key/value elements (key=option-tags value-part, name=between option tag)
00063      * @param string $selected keyname of the element to be default selected
00064      * @param array $selectAttr array of attributes of the select-tag, for example "class"=>"dontunderline"
00065      * @param array $optionAttr array of attributes for each option-tag, for example "class"=>"dontunderline"
00066      * @param boolean $showEmpty if we should display an empty option as the default selection so the user knows (s)he has to select something
00067      */
00068     function selectTag($fieldName, $optionElements, $selected = null, $selectAttr = array (), $optionAttr = array (), $showEmpty = false) {
00069         $select = array ();
00070         if (!is_array($optionElements)) {
00071             return null;
00072         }
00073         if (isset ($selectAttr) && array_key_exists("multiple", $selectAttr)) {
00074             $select[] = sprintf($this->tags['selectmultiplestart'], $fieldName, $this->parseAttributes($selectAttr));
00075         } else {
00076             $select[] = sprintf($this->tags['selectstart'], $fieldName, $this->parseAttributes($selectAttr));
00077         }
00078         if ($showEmpty == true) {
00079             $select[] = sprintf($this->tags['selectempty'], $this->parseAttributes($optionAttr));
00080         }
00081         foreach ($optionElements as $name => $title) {
00082 
00083             $optionsHere = $optionAttr;
00084 
00085             if (($selected != null) && ((string)$selected == (string)$name)) {
00086                 $optionsHere['selected'] = 'selected';
00087             }
00088             elseif (is_array($selected) && in_array($name, $selected)) {
00089                 $optionsHere['selected'] = 'selected';
00090             }
00091 
00092             $select[] = sprintf($this->tags['selectoption'], $name, $this->parseAttributes($optionsHere), h($title));
00093 
00094         }
00095 
00096         $select[] = sprintf($this->tags['selectend']);
00097         return implode("\n", $select);
00098     }
00099 
00100     /**
00101      * escape string stuitable for javascript output. can also be used to
00102      * escape raw php code you want to output (for include or eval) but NOT
00103      * to escape HTML for XSS-protection!
00104      * 
00105      * @param string $s string to escape
00106      * @param bool $singleQuotes if single quotes should be escaped (true) or double-quotes (false)
00107      */
00108     function escape($s, $singleQuotes = true) {
00109         if ($singleQuotes) {
00110             return str_replace(array (
00111                 "'",
00112                 "\n",
00113                 "\r"
00114             ), array (
00115                 '\\\'',
00116                 "\\n",
00117                 ""
00118             ), $s);
00119         }
00120         return str_replace(array (
00121             '"',
00122             "\n",
00123             "\r"
00124         ), array (
00125             '\\"',
00126             "\\n",
00127             ""
00128         ), $s);
00129     }

00132 /**
00133  * generate individual tags if DEBUG>0 OR pack all files into a single one, chache the file,
00134  * replace with a single tag that points to a url that reads the cached+joined file
00135  *
00136  * Minifies only in DEBUG <= 0
00137  *
00138  * all .c.css files are computed
00139  * 
00140  * @param array $files individual files, relative to webroot
00141  * @param string $target js/css
00142  * @param string $tagFormat printf-able string of the individual tag
00143  * @param bool $cacheAndMinify if we should join+compress+cache given target
00144  * @param bool $rtl include rtl-stuff instead of ltr-stuff
00145  */
00146     private function joinFiles($files,$target,$tagFormat,$cacheAndMinify,$rtl=false) {
00147         // debugging? just return individual tags
00148         if (!$cacheAndMinify) {
00149             $html = '';
00150             foreach ($files as $file) {
00151                 if ('.c.css'==substr($file,-6,6)) {
00152                     $html .= $this->joinFiles(array($file),$target,$tagFormat,true,$rtl);
00153                 } else {
00154                     $html .= sprintf($tagFormat,$this->url($target.'/'.$file));
00155                 }
00156             }
00157             return $html;
00158         }
00159 
00160         kataMakeTmpPath('cache');
00161 
00162         // cachefile exists and is young enough?
00163         $slug = md5(implode($files,',').(defined('VERSION')?VERSION:'').($rtl?'rtl':''));
00164         $cacheFile = KATATMP.'cache'.DS.$target.'.cache.'.$slug;
00165         if (file_exists($cacheFile) && (time()-filemtime($cacheFile)<HOUR) && DEBUG <= 0) {
00166             return sprintf($tagFormat,$this->url($target.'/_cache-'.$slug));
00167         }
00168 
00169         // build cachefile
00170         $content = '';
00171         foreach ($files as $file) {
00172             $x = strpos($file,'?');
00173             if ($x>0) { $file = substr($file,0,$x); }
00174 
00175             $txt = file_get_contents(WWW_ROOT.$target.DS.$file);
00176             if (false === $txt) {
00177                 throw new Exception("html: cant find $target-file '$file'");
00178             }
00179             if ('.c.css'==substr($file,-6,6)) {
00180                 $txt = $this->filterCss($txt,$rtl);
00181             }
00182 
00183             $content .= $txt."\n\n\n\n\n\n";
00184         }
00185 
00186         $ignoreMinify = (DEBUG > 0);
00187 
00188         if ('css' == $target && !$ignoreMinify) {
00189             $miniUtil = getUtil('Minify');
00190             $content = $miniUtil->css($content);
00191         }
00192         if ('js' == $target && !$ignoreMinify) {
00193             $miniUtil = getUtil('Minify');
00194             $content = $miniUtil->js($content);
00195         }
00196 
00197         file_put_contents($cacheFile,$content);
00198 
00199         return sprintf($tagFormat,$this->url($target.'/_cache-'.$slug.(DEBUG > 0 ? '?'.time() : '')));
00200     }
00201 
00202 /**
00203  * return javascript-tags for all given files.
00204  * if DEBUG<=0 all files are joined into a single one and are sent compressed to the browser
00205  * otherweise individual javascript-src-tags are generated
00206  * 
00207  * @param array $files filename of script to include, relative to webroot/js/
00208  * @param bool $cacheAndMinify if we should join+compress+cache given target
00209  * @return string javascript-tag(s)
00210  */
00211     function javascriptTag($files,$cacheAndMinify=false) {
00212         if (is_string($files)) { $files = array($files); }
00213         return $this->joinFiles($files,'js',$this->tags['jsfile'],$cacheAndMinify);
00214     }
00215 
00216 /**
00217  * return css-tags for all given files.
00218  * if DEBUG<=0 all files are joined into a single one and are sent compressed to the browser,
00219  * otherweise individual link-tags are generated
00220  * 
00221  * @param array $files filename of css to include, relative to webroot/css/
00222  * @param bool $rtl if we should include rtl-styles instead of ltr
00223  * @param bool $cacheAndMinify if we should join+compress+cache given target
00224  * @return string css-tag(s)
00225  */
00226     function cssTag($files,$cacheAndMinify=false,$rtl=false) {
00227         if (is_string($files)) { $files = array($files); }
00228         return $this->joinFiles($files,'css',$this->tags['cssfile'],$cacheAndMinify,$rtl);
00229     }
00230 
00231 /**
00232  * output a url with __token get parameter appended. used for xsrf-detection
00233  * 
00234  * @param string $url url to add __token to
00235  * @return string url with token appended
00236  */
00237     function tokenUrl($url) {
00238         $url = $this->url($url);
00239         $token = is($this->vars['__token'],'');
00240         if ('' == $token) {
00241             return $url;
00242         }
00243 
00244         $x = strpos($url,'?');
00245         if (false !== $x) {
00246             return substr($url,0,$x).'?__token='.$token.'&'.substr($url,$x+1);
00247         }
00248 
00249         $x = strpos($url,'#');
00250         if (false !== $x) {
00251             return substr($url,0,$x).'?__token='.$token.substr($url,$x+1);
00252         }
00253 
00254         return $url.'?__token='.$token;
00255     }
00256 
00257 /**
00258  * compress given css-string
00259  * 
00260  * @param string $css styles to compress
00261  * @return string the compressed css
00262  */
00263     function compressCss($css) {
00264         $minifyUtil = getUtil('Minify');
00265         return $minifyUtil->css($css);
00266     }
00267 
00268     function filterCss($css,$rtl=false) {
00269         $lines = explode('}',$css);
00270         unset($css);
00271 
00272         $output = '';
00273         foreach ($lines as $line) {
00274             $line = trim($line);
00275             if ('' != $line) {
00276                 $parts = explode('{',$line);
00277                 if (count($parts)<2) {
00278                     throw new Exception('RTLCSS parse error: '.$line);
00279                 }
00280                 if (strtolower(substr($parts[0],0,7))!='/*rtl*/' && !$rtl) {
00281                     $output.=$line."}\n";
00282                 }
00283                 if (strtolower(substr($parts[0],0,7))!='/*ltr*/' && $rtl) {
00284                     $output.=$line."}\n";
00285                 }
00286             }
00287         }
00288 
00289         return $output;
00290     }
